entity.name: Andrew Cuomo
entity.description: Governor of New York, Andrew Cuomo

text: @NYGovCuomo Yes, we get it. As long as we wear a mask its ok for our cities to be destroyed. For our people to get killed by violence, but God forbid not by Covid19. Thank you for refusing to protect New Yorkers and causing us to be scared shitless of riots without police protection.
